attributes.action: To place a salary cap on all clubs in the Premier League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of the Premiership being dominated by teams with all the money, it is predictable, expensive and unfair on other teams. If the salary cap was introduced then the league would become far more interesting and like rugby league any team can win!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
